#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define  ll long long 

int main()
{
        ll int t , n , m , a ,b ;
        cin >> t;

        while ( t-- )
        {
                cin >> n >> m;
                a = 1; b = 1;
                for ( int i = 1; i < n ; i++ )
                {
                        a = (a+b)%m;
                        b = (a+b)%m;

                }
                cout << a%m << "/" << b%m << endl;
        }

        return 0;
}
